backend/main.mo: Defines player profiles and a map of profiles plus a list of 20 luxury car definitions with stats and unlock costs.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for authentication, garage, racing, and missions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for each frontend file, describing styling, components, pages, game data, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes with global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/api/playerApi.ts: Manages guest-mode player profiles in localStorage with currency updates and car ownership operations.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures router, theme, and authentication gating, routing authenticated users into the main game layout.
frontend/src/auth/guestSession.ts: Handles creation, retrieval, and clearing of guest session IDs via localStorage.
frontend/src/auth/useAuthMode.ts: Combines guest and Internet Identity auth states and exposes current mode, display name, and sign-out logic.
frontend/src/auth/useGuestSession.ts: React hook exposing guest session state with start/end session helpers.
frontend/src/components/CurrencyBalances: Displays gold and diamond balances, switching between backend and guest profiles with periodic updates in guest mode.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Defines the main authenticated layout with header, navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/HeaderBar.tsx: Renders the top header with logo, currency balances, and a user dropdown showing auth mode and sign-out option.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Provides a horizontal navigation bar with links and icons, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/components/PlayerProgress.t: Displays player level, race stats, and XP progress based on either backend or local profile data.
frontend/src/gameData/diamondPacks.ts: Defines the DiamondPack interface and a list of purchasable diamond packs with prices and bonuses.
frontend/src/gameData/luxuryCars.ts: Provides the LuxuryCar interface and a catalog of cars with stats, rarity, unlock costs, and image paths.
frontend/src/gameData/missions.ts: Contains mission definitions including daily, weekly, and achievement tasks with targets and gold rewards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, cars, purchases, selections, and leaderboard interactions via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom themes, colors, and utility classes for light/dark modes and UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn utility combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AuthPage.tsx: Login screen allowing users to sign in with Internet Identity or start a guest session.
frontend/src/pages/GaragePage.tsx: Displays the user's car collection with filters, and handles selecting or purchasing cars using local profile data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing player progress, leaderboard highlights, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/MissionsPage.tsx: Shows daily, weekly, and achievement missions, calculates progress, and lets users claim gold rewards.
frontend/src/pages/RaceLobbyPage.tsx: Interface to create or join race lobbies, generating lobby codes and managing current lobby state.
frontend/src/pages/TopUpPage.tsx: Presents diamond packs for purchase, updates local diamond balance, and tracks purchase history.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a non-real-time multiplayer racing game, its scope, authentication modes, image requirements, and architectural notes.
